Nucleoplasm:
Emery-Dreifuss muscular dystrophy (EDMD),
 dilated cardiomyopathy, familial partial lipodystrophy
Nuclear membrane:
Mandibuloacral dysplasia, and
 Hutchinson-Gilford progeria syndrome
Golgi apparatus:
Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis 
 ,Parkinson's disease, Huntington's disease,
 Creutzfeldt-Jacob disease
Peroxisomes:
Zellweger syndromespectrum 
(PBD-ZSD) and rhizomelic 
chondrodysplasia punctata type 1
Focal adhesion sites:
idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis or
 scleroderma (systemic sclerosis)
Microtubules:
Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis,
 Hereditary Spastic Paraplegia
Plasma membrane:
type II familial hypercholesterolaemia,
 Grave's disease
